description:
While trying to delete a secgroup using nova secgroup-delete command using secgroup ID
nova fails to delete the secgroup

The issue comes when we have multiple secgroup with same name
title: nova not able to delete secgroup using ID

comments.content:
While trying to delete a secgroup using nova secgroup-delete command using secgroup ID
nova fails to delete the secgroup

The issue comes when we have multiple secgroup with same name
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~satroutr

comments.content:
Hi this bug was fixed.

the patch: https://review.openstack.org/55546
the original bug: https://bugs.launchpad.net/python-novaclient/+bug/1247728
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~academicgareth

comments.content:
And if you delete secgroup by same name, you could get this output:

ERROR: Multiple security group matches found for name 'same_haha', use an ID to be more specific.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~academicgareth
